login.FORGOT_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Don't worry. Resetting your password is easy, just tell us the email address you registered with {{ORGANISATION_NAME}}.
login.2FA_SETUP_SCREEN_SETUP_SUB_HEADNG: Download a authenticator app on your mobile device, and scan this QR code to set up your account.
login.2FA_TOTP_SCREEN_SUB_HEADING: Open the authenticator app on your mobile device and enter the 2FA code associated with your {{ORGANISATION_NAME}} account.
login.RECOVERY_SCREEN_SUBHEADER_TEXT: If you have lost your mobile device in which 2FA was enabled, just enter the recovery codes that were provided during setup to add a new device.
login.SETUP_COMPLETION_SUB_HEADING: Print or save these recovery codes in a safe place to be able to recover your account if you lose your mobile device.
